attributes.action: Stop Islam being made synonymous to terrorism.
attributes.additional_details:
Islams fundamentals preach love, not hate. Respect not disrespect. There are millions of Muslims on earth and a very small handful are these extremists. It is unfair that all Muslims are branded as terrorists due to this. 

We do not see Christianity likened to the beliefs of the KKK. Nor Hindus to the Tamil Tigers. So why Islam to Terrorists?

I ask that use of Islam in a negative way, or for that matter ANY religion, be made unlawful as to not cause offence or seclusion of said religion.
attributes.background: For a very long time now, Islam has been interpretted as a religion of violence and hatred. A religion that inspires terrorism. This is not the case. Islam is as peaceful as all religions.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
